tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match the Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Evaluate yield forecast using OCI forecasting service
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Evaluate yield, equipment OEE using OCI anomaly detection
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Evaluate quality defects using OCI vision service
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
